description: Triangle of coefficients of Euler polynomials E_2n(x) (exponents in decreasing order).
references: M. Abramowitz and I. A. Stegun, eds., Handbook of Mathematical Functions, National Bureau of Standards Applied Math. Series 55, 1964 (and various reprintings), p. 809.
